text: A thoughtful reflection on the legacy of Henry Kissinger ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ï¸ His realist approach to foreign policy led to strategic successes, such as improved relations with China and the division of the Communist bloc. It's crucial we remember his effectiveness in a world that has lost touch with pragmatic diplomacy. Instead of overreaching in the Middle East and risking dangerous rivalries, let's learn from history and embrace a more balanced foreign policy ğŸŒ
